connector.description: Receive data from an IBM Cloud Object Storage Bucket.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.apiKey.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.apiKey
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.apiKey.description: IBM Cloud API Key for authentication.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.location.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.location
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.location.description: IBM COS Location/Region (e.g., us-south, eu-gb). Example: us-south

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.deleteAfter.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.deleteAfterRead
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.deleteAfter.description: Specifies to delete objects after consuming them.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.moveAfterRe.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.moveAfterRead
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.moveAfterRe.description: Move objects from IBM COS bucket to a different bucket after they have been retrieved.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destination.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destinationBucket
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destination.description: Define the destination bucket where an object must be moved when moveAfterRead is set to true.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destination.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destinationBucketPrefix
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destination.description: Define the destination bucket prefix to use when an object must be moved, and moveAfterRead is set to true.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destination.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destinationBucketSuffix
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.destination.description: Define the destination bucket suffix to use when an object must be moved, and moveAfterRead is set to true.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.autoCreateB.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.autoCreateB.description: Specifies to automatically create the IBM COS bucket.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.prefix.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.prefix
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.prefix.description: The IBM COS bucket prefix to consider while searching. Example: folder/

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.delimiter.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.delimiter
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.delimiter.description: The delimiter to use for listing objects.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.includeBody.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.includeBody
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.includeBody.description: If true, the object body is included in the exchange. If false, only headers are set.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.delay
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll of the selected bucket.

camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.maxMessages.name: camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.maxMessagesPerPoll
camel.kamelet.ibm-cos-source.maxMessages.description: Gets the maximum number of messages as a limit to poll at each polling. The default value is 10. Use 0 or a negative number to set it as unlimited.
